期: (ki) - () - period of time , period, time; age; term (por exemplo, no escritório), period; session (e.g. of parliament)
期す: (ごす) - to expect/to look forward to; to set (a date, etc.); to resolve/to pledge (to oneself)/to vow
期する: (ごする) - to expect/to look forward to/to foresee/to anticipate; to set a time/to set a date; to resolve/to decide upon/to prepare/to promise/to pledge
期せずして: (きせずして) - unexpectedly; accidentally; by chance
期外収縮性不整脈: (きがいしゅうしゅくせいふせいみゃく) - extrasystolic arrhythmia
期差選任: (きさせんにん) - staggered terms (applied to corporate directors as a defensive measure against hostile takeovers)
期待どおり: (きたいどおり) - as expected (positive events); as hoped for
期待にかなう: (きたいにかなう) - to live up to (one's) expectations
期待に応える: (きたいにこたえる) - to live up to expectations; to meet expectations
期待に沿う: (きたいにそう) - to live up to (one's) expectations; to meet expectations
期待に適う: (きたいにかなう) - to live up to (one's) expectations
期待をかける: (きたいをかける) - to hang one's hopes on; to expect from
期待を寄せる: (きたいをよせる) - (often ...に期待を...) to pin one's hope on; to look forward to; to look toward; to get one's hopes up
期待を掛ける: (きたいをかける) - to hang one's hopes on; to expect from
期待値: (きたいち) - expected value; expectation value; expectation
期待権: (きたいけん) - expectant right (as opposed to a vested right); contingent right
期待薄: (きたいうす) - not to be depended on; of little hope
期待通り: (きたいどおり) - as expected (positive events); as hoped for
期成: (きせい) - realization of an objective; realisation of an objective
期成同盟: (きせいどうめい) - association formed to carry out an objective
期日を早める: (きじつをはやめる) - to advance the date (of)
期日前投票: (きじつまえとうひょう) - early voting
期末テスト: (きまつテスト) - term-end exam; end-of-term test; finals
期末試験: (きまつしけん) - final exam; term-end examination; end-of-term examination
期近物: (きぢかもの) - current delivery/near delivery/new delivery; nearby futures contract
期間中: (きかんちゅう) - during; for the duration of

期間工: (きかんこう) - factory worker with a fixed term contract of employment

期間社員: (きかんしゃいん) - worker with a fixed term contract of employment
期間限定: (きかんげんてい) - limited time; limited-time offer
期限が切れる: (きげんがきれる) - to have a time-limit expire; to pass a deadline; to pass an expiration date
期限を延ばす: (きげんをのばす) - to extend the term; to extend a deadline
期限付き: (きげんつき) - with a fixed time; with a deadline
期限切れ: (きげんぎれ) - expiration of a term; becoming overdue
期限切れ検査: (きげんぎれけんさ) - expiration check; retention period check
朦々: (もうもう) - dense (e.g. fog, dust, etc.)/thick; vague (as in being unable to think clearly)/dim
朦朦: (もうもう) - dense (e.g. fog, dust, etc.)/thick; vague (as in being unable to think clearly)/dim

朧昆布: (おぼろこんぶ) - shredded tangle or kelp

朧月夜: (おぼろづきよ) - misty, moonlit night; (spring) night with a hazy moon
朧気: (おぼろげ) - vague; faint; dim; indistinct

木々: (kigi) - (muitas) árvores, cada árvore, todos os tipos de árvores
木いちご: (キイチゴ) - raspberry (any plant of genus Rubus, esp. Rubus palmatus var. coptophyllus)
木から落ちた猿: (きからおちたさる) - person who has lost something they used to rely on; a monkey fallen from the tree
木くず: (きくず) - wood chips; wood offcuts; wood shavings; sawdust
